# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Quartermaster
The Quartermaster is the head of the Cargo department. They are expected to oversee the department, and ensure that the cargo is being handled in a safe and efficient manner.
## Do - Ensure the department is running smoothly. - Ensure the cargo is being handled in a safe and efficient manner. - Be prepared to respond to a station-wide threat and ensure weapons and medical supplies are available.
